data.title: WALGREENS BOOTS ALLIANCE SERVICES LIMITED modern slavery statement summary (2021)
data.text:
Recommended areas covered by the statement

Government guidance encourages organisations to cover a range of areas in their modern slavery statements, setting out the steps theyâ€™re taking to address modern slavery risks in their operations and supply chains. Read about the recommended areas in the statutory guidance.

We asked the organisation to tell us which areas its statement covers.
